name: Steam - Lunar Year Profile 2019
description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. ― Sweet! The Lunar Year Profile 2019 is here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile because you were simply too busy with your life, or because it was too expensive to acquire more tokens and you didn't want to spend your money on something temporary, well don't be sad because now you can use this profile as long as you want! Feel free to share it with all your friends!

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info:
<mark><q>Notice: To Install styles, click the "Show Css Code" button first. The install button will work after that.
The devs are no longer actively involved in the forum, so any bug reports regarding the extension or website should be sent to them directly at contact@userstyles.org.</q></mark>

I re-created this profile for people who could not get their hands on the Lunar Year profile or simply because they did not want to waste their precious money on it by purchasing those tokens to get it since this add-on was gonna disappear eventually. I'm sorry for the delay, I was quite busy these days.

Please note that the lanterns are not there (yet) or might never be in their animated state. I need to find a suitable container to add the moveable parts. Since everything is done with CSS and CSS3, there's a lot of limitations. So unless I can find a suitable container I can use without breaking the entire profile, there won't be any lantern for now. I'm sorry, I know that's what brings the charm to this theme, I will do what I can.

On the other hand, I actually did change some stuff which I didn't like in the original theme such as some blue texts which was.. out of the blue (Hah! Get it? Sorry), it was just not matching with the rest of the theme. And I also fixed some issues, like some actual missing backgrounds. I might change the background for the container that holds the entire profile as well. The red thingy in the back? I think that looks really off. Anyway! That's pretty much it for now!
